attributes.additional_details: I have heard it could be a point of bullying about children having “cheap clothes”. To comeback this: all schools have a punishment system, they can use it in this situation.
attributes.background: In schools all over the United Kingdom, school uniform is apart of their dress-code. Students say: “It’s uncomfortable and pointless”. And, it can cost £60+ just for 1 year worth of uniform. And with the “cost-of-living” it is too much.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for the same action:

Ban compulsory school uniforms:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/639304
